content: the second stitch holder together layer 2 finishing put the stitches from the first stitch holder back onto the knitting seam the cast on and bind off edges together needles and knit the same as for layer 1 do not cut your yarn weave in ends wash and block © theresia lew 2025 double distaff @schnueffeltier www thepassioknitspinner de 3 your distaff will look like this before seaming because the bands are abbreviations knit using double knitting they have also created small pockets if you don t want those you can use the ends from the actual pocket sl1wyif = slip 1 stitch purl-wise holding the yarn in front of and create small seams along the edges of the garter stitch that your knitting way you will close the band pockets up and only the intentional k1 = knit 1 stitch double garter layer pocket remains k2tog = knit 2 stitches together social media please share your versions of this pattern using #tpks_doubledistaff and #thepassioknitspinner on instagram all rights reserved pattern for personal use only © theresia lew 2025 double distaff @schnueffeltier www thepassioknitspinner de 4
